item.description:
Hey All,

(But wait there's more! ...)

Join us or not for the Good, the Bad and the Ugly Afternoon Shoot at the Manchester Firing Line -- but don't miss out on The Yummy, The Tasty and The Savory at Gauchos Churrascaria Brazilian Steak House!

 

We asked the local at the range to suggest a place -- and Gauchos was a real winner!!

 

$30 a head gets you all you can eat of some of the tastiest Brazilian-seasoned meats... steak, lamb, pork ... different kinds and cuts... the waiters, called "Gauchos" for the pants protectors they wear, walk around with 3-4 foot long skewers stacked with meat ... call 'em over if they don't stop right away ... and they'll load you up with whatever you want! ... There is an all you can eat salad bar included in the deal. See the website for other menu options.

 

We'll be meeting at the restaurant at 5:30PM ... if you don't see us ... or forgot what we look like between the range and the restaurant, just ask for the meetup group!

 

Please RSVP so that we can book a table of the correct size. If you are not 100% sure you can make the dinner, please don't RSVP! Thanks.

But wait there's more! ...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mark or Gavin. Our mugs should be familiar by now! :-) Ask the maitre d'hotel for the meetup group

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Annual NH Shoot, Dine and Ski Weekend: Sat. Early Evening Dinner
